chunk_prompt: Summarize this content about Vision Rehabilitation Services:
final_prompt: Summarize this content about Vision Rehabilitation Services:

sentences.text: they had to go on disability and into rehabilitation therapy for over a year.
literally never write things off as something else, it’s always better to look crazy than be dead.
they can become infected super easily and be bad.
just to add to this for awareness - if you were strangled by a romantic partner, you are 750% more likely to be killed by them.
sharing a resource here to help with abusive relationships in case anyone reading this needs help.
